exchange_rate_note: Bank exchange rates na the rates wey banks dey charge to exchange one currency for another. Parallel exchange rates na the rates wey independent foreign exchange dealers dey charge to exchange one currency for another. Parallel exchange rates dey usually better for customers because dem no dey subject to the same fees and charges like bank exchange rates.

are_you_sure_activate_store: You sure say you wan activate this store
payment_detail_message: So dat we go fit waka your money from sales, we go need di tori of your bank account. Abeg give us your bank name and account number so dat we go fit process di waka.
tell_more_about_store: Products dey list and sell for USD for KWOT. But you go collect your money for either USD or your local currency based on di beta rate wey dey ground.
tell_more_about_store_content: For Nigerians, di beta rate na di parallel market exchange rate.
tell_where_shop_based: Tell us wia your shop dey based.
currency_select_info: Di default currency wey go dey use to price your products na di United States dollar (USD). You go need convert di price of your products using di current exchange rate.
category_define_info: Which category dey best explain your product?
store_name_show_sellers: You fit give your store name here.
store_name_appear: Your store name go show for your store and beside each of your products for Kwot.
enter_store_name_with_chars: Enter your store name. Max 40 characters
store_name: E no follow say [{{field}}] don enta, but our name generator don show us some similar names wey dey available:
explanatory_text: You fit upload your store logo and banner here.
must_be: Upload {{types}} wey be {{dimensions}} and e no suppose pass {{size}}
upload_must_be: Upload {{types}} wey be {{dimensions}} and e no suppose pass {{size}}
cannot_upload: E no dey possible to upload file wey pass {{size}}
tell_about_yourself: Tell us small small about yourself
primary_store_owner: Primary store owner for the business
add_many_products:
Dis step na option; you fit complete am now or later wen your Kwot store don approve. If you get tori of your product dem ready, we recommend say you complete dis step now.
Here, you fit provide tori about your products. Add as many products as you fit. We recommend say you add 10 or more products because more product mean more chance to make sales. You fit edit your product tori anytime.
add_product_or_skip: You dey start to add product for your store. You fit stop for any stage of adding your product and you fit come back later to finish am. No worry, you no go lose your progress.
about_to_open_store:
You don finish set up your Kwot store. We dey verify your information and we go notify you soon.

Your Kwot store go dey live for buyers, and you go fit start sell once your store don verify. For now, you fit continue add more products to your Kwot store.
thanks_for_activating: Thank you for create your Kwot account.
congrats: Congratulations, you don complete this step successfully!

Na here you go see
the products for your store
you_can_start_after_bank_verified: You no fit start sell products for your store until we verify your profile.

tell_buyers_about_product_description: Tell your buyers about your product. Try make am concise because long texts dey often unread.

price_inventory_info: Dem list the product price for USD for KWOT and you go pay with local currency or USD. We go use parallel exchange rates for payment. Bank exchange rates na the rates wey banks dey use change one currency to another. Parallel exchange rates na the rates wey independent foreign exchange dealers dey use change one currency to another. Parallel exchange rates usually beta for people because dem no dey charge the same fees and charges like bank exchange rates.
add_quantity_for_product: Add the number of units wey dey available for this product.
try_short_message: Provide details about the personalisation wey you fit do, for example, we fit engrave name for the product.
think_about_product_por_message: Determine the space on your product wey fit carry message and specify the number of characters wey buyers fit use.
add_location_for_product: The shipping provider go pick your product from the address wey you provide.
remove_product_confirm_note: You sure say you wan remove this product? All the product information go lost and you no go fit retrieve am.
product_is_not_active_note: This product no dey active yet. E go dey available to buyers when you open your shop.

remove_product_sub_title: Remember say if you remove product, you no fit bring am back. If you wan make product no show for public without deleting am forever, abeg deactivate the product instead. You go fit edit or reactivate am anytime.

no_order_title:
Dis na where you go manage
your orders when dem start show.

no_order_notes.title: Some the things wey you fit do here:
no_order_notes.point1: Arrange and manage orders the way wey you like.
no_order_notes.point2: Update and complete multiple orders at once.
no_order_notes.point3: Message customers without commot for your orders page.
